Body:
I used the following code to upload a sample value to my web server:

It connects to my router and just uploads some sample data in the name of dir. In my server kecsmarthelmet.com I have a few files for Index, Upload.php etc.

The request goes to Upload.php and after execution the output file returns blank.

And the PHP file for Upload is as follows:

<?php	  $dir = $_POST["dir"];	  echo file_get_contents($dir);	  $file =  './current.txt';	  file_put_contents($file
column15:
$dir); ?>

At execution in the output file. nothing appears. It remains as blank space.

"

Body: You are sending it to update.php not Upload.php. Also, what is `echo file_get_contents($dir);` supposed to do? Dump contents from a file named `380.00`?
